objects.specification: A smooth square platform floor with a subtle matte concrete finish in light grey, precisely 6 meters by 6 meters with a thickness of 0.1 meters, providing a sturdy base for the booth.
A flat back wall panel standing 3 meters high, featuring a smooth neutral light grey finish, forming the rear boundary of the booth with clean straight edges.
A left side wall panel of the booth, 3 meters tall with a smooth light grey surface and sharp corners, oriented to frame the space while leaving the front open.
A right side wall panel matching the left, reaching 3 meters in height with a neutral light grey finish, forming the booth’s side boundary.

A minimalistic registration desk with clean geometric lines, glossy bright red lacquer finish in a vivid RGB tone, measuring 1.5 meters wide by 0.7 meters deep and standing 1 meter high for an eye-catching focal point.
A slender rectangular display stand with smooth white lacquered surfaces and subtle beveled edges, measuring 0.5 by 0.5 meters footprint and 1 meter tall, designed to present products elegantly.
A matching white lacquered display pedestal with refined minimalist styling, slender proportions and a flat top surface for showcasing items in the booth.
An identical tall display column in crisp white finish, featuring clean lines and a recessed top area for product placement, standing 1 meter tall.
A symmetrical display stand with simple cubic form and lacquered white surface, designed to match the other stands and emphasize displayed items.
A small round table with a smooth white laminate tabletop and a single brushed metal cylindrical support, 1 meter in diameter and 0.75 meters tall, offering a clean contemporary look.
An identical round table with a sleek white top and polished metal central column, matching the other table for cohesive seating areas.
A standard four-legged chair with matte grey metal frame, molded plastic seat and backrest in a medium blue tone, ergonomic contours and simple modern styling.
A matching chair with grey metal legs and a smooth blue plastic seat and back, featuring clean minimal lines and comfortable proportions.
An identical seating unit with sturdy grey metal frame and blue molded plastic surfaces for both seat and backrest, executed in a simple modern design.
A complementary chair with steel grey legs and medium blue seat and back, reflecting a minimalist aesthetic and comfortable form.
A visually matching chair with a clean grey metal framework and a vibrant blue plastic seating surface, designed for casual comfort.
A four-legged chair in a neutral grey finish with a bright blue ergonomic seat and back, minimalistic and sturdy.
A consistent seating piece with matte grey support structure and a medium blue contoured plastic seat and back, simple in form.
A coordinating chair with grey metal legs and blue plastic seating surfaces, ergonomic and lightweight.
A vibrant yellow elongated fabric banner with a slight sheen, simple rectangle shape hanging from the top edge of the wall to draw attention.
A vibrant green slim rectangular banner made of glossy fabric, suspended along the top of the back wall for visual impact.
A bold blue fabric banner with a sleek elongated rectangular form, hanging from the right wall’s upper edge to attract visitor focus.
A slim cylindrical spotlight fixture in bright yellow, mounted to the ceiling and directed downward to illuminate the registration desk with focused light.
A matching thin yellow cylindrical spotlight, ceiling-mounted and aimed at the central display stands to showcase products with sharp illumination.
A glossy inflatable red latex balloon with a semi-translucent surface and gentle sheen, floating at mid-height for decorative effect.
A bright blue spherical balloon with a soft sheen, made of semi-translucent latex, suspended to add color and volume.
A vibrant yellow round balloon crafted from glossy latex, semi-transparent and gently floating near the ceiling for visual interest.
A green decorative balloon with a shiny latex finish and subtle translucency, adding a playful accent to the rear corner.
A purple latex balloon with a glossy surface and slight transparency, floating at varied height to complete the decorative arrangement.
